works.complaint:
Dear Google,

Our site Esources.co.uk has been under constant attack by a fraudulent  
company called Dropshipland.com that we exposed back in 2010. The owner has  
since been creating fake blogs, forum threads, and reviews across sites in  
order to defame us.


Here is a list of fake reviews created by them. We have calculated that  
over 90% of the posts were submitted by the owner of the forum, based on  
the fact that the name surname combinations very rarely match any of our  
over 880,000 accounts and that the claims made have no correspondence with  
how our service operates:
